column4: hi, when use flash in website and i want to look at a movie with totem(at the same time), my movie is playing in slow motion...why ? i heard that flash used 99% of my CPU.. how can i do ?
flash is a closed source product and can't be supported by ubuntu, if it's eating your cpu you may need to talk to adobe
but i dont know if that's true
check out, use top to monitor your cpu useag
